name: Fire and Ice (itch) (Lyze)
description:
Best played on chromium browsers.

Fire and Ice

Libgdx gamejam project; september 2020

https://github.com/lyze237/FireAndIce

Two players recommended but it works solo as well!

Controls

Player 1: WASD or Controller

Player 2: Arrow Keys or Controller

F12: Restart Level

Tips

Jump onto enemy souls to kill the enemy in the other dimension!

Colored portals are only accessibly by the same colored player!

The last two levels require quite a bit of know-how. :P
